title: FireDAO
author: FireDAO
content: This map illustrates the circulation of our ecosystem, starting from market revenues and ending with the allocation of support to the LP of governance token. Although it is only a part of the entire project, it is undoubtedly the most crucial aspect. You are all welcome to ask as many questions as possible and let's discuss them.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Honestly, with whatever is proposed with these road maps and illustrations, they're all optimistic not until they won't happen. I have seen a lot of great roadmaps, plans and anything related to a good economy and projects that has visions to what they're working on. But admitting a fact on it is that most of them have low to no chance of being implemented.But if you do so with your project or whoever is working on this development, just wishing you luck with it.

comments.author: FireDAO
comments.body: Quote from: livingfree on June 10, 2023, 07:22:09 AMHonestly, with whatever is proposed with these road maps and illustrations, they're all optimistic not until they won't happen. I have seen a lot of great roadmaps, plans and anything related to a good economy and projects that has visions to what they're working on. But admitting a fact on it is that most of them have low to no chance of being implemented.But if you do so with your project or whoever is working on this development, just wishing you luck with it.It's no longer just an illustrations. All of the concepts has been developed into smart contract where we had shared it in Github. (https://github.com/firedaolab)Now we're looking for our first group of OG that support this project. Only OG can get the whitelist to purchase our OG-FDT token. OG whitelist can be obtained by earning points in Zealy (https://zealy.io/c/firedao/questboard). Points in Zealy can be exchanged for our incentives token FLM too.
